Classes

class  GameCrateBox
 GameCrateBox class handles the creation (cloning) of the ammunition at a position determined by the previous obstacle placed in the world. This is instantiated through GameModelFactory implementation.It is a kind of obstacle, so inherits obstacle and shares the properties. More...
